text: Mbe mba tugen Sisar Kuairinias ndim fagim, ana Siria fhaiŋ gari guman pan ki. Ana Siria gari guman pan kim, mbe fhara guarara, mba gumgi gu mbigi zɨri ndigi. 2.2 Mba tugivigen, mbe Romiŋ, mben guman pan Isreriŋ gari. Kha ŋgu bakɨme, ana mbe kha zɨn kaai ŋgu bakɨme fhaiŋ vhen ki, Siria. Mbe Romiŋ, mbe wari won guman pana rɨgi zɨ khare, Sisar.
